id.dldescription: Unique Id of the animal event

animalId.dldescription: Unique Id of the related animal

herdEventId.dldescription: Unique Id of the related herd event

date.dldescription: The date that the event occured

notes.dldescription: Any notes relating to the event

eventType.dldescription: The type of Event this is (Reproduction, Milking, Weigh)

content.dldescription: The class specified by event type eg.(Reproduction, Milking, Weigh)
